file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-06-04 - MAIN-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the main-door trim shroud assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - ALL 25-23-06-000-801-A REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - ALL 25-23-06-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-23-06 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the main-door trim shroud assembly. (2) The main-door trim shroud assembly is installed in the passenger cabin, around the main door, at zone 231. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION MPP 23-31-03 - MPP 25-21-02 - MPP 33-50-16 - S.B.145-52-0005 - SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the sealant from around the base of the door corners (9) and (14) (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Remove the flashlight assembly of the LH cockpit passenger cabin partition (MPP 33-50-16). (3) Remove the attendant handset of the LH cockpit passenger cabin partition (MPP 23-31-03). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-06 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the shroud Assy of the LH cockpit passenger cabin partition (MPP 25-21-02). (5) Remove the screw that attaches the door vertical trim shroud. (6) Remove the door vertical trim shroud (see DET. B) as follows. NOTE: Do step (a) below for all aircraft, except for those equipped with side-hinged main door or POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0005. (a) Remove the screws (7) and washers (6) and then the vertical trim shroud (8). NOTE: • Do steps (b) and (c) below only for aircraft equipped with side- hinged main door or POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0005. • The vertical trim shroud (2) is attached with Velcro fastener. (b) Remove the screws (3) and washers (4) and then the vertical trim shrouds (5) and (1). (c) Remove the vertical trim shroud (2). (7) Remove the screws (11) and washers (10) and then the door forward corner trim shroud (9). (8) Remove the screw (13) and washer (12) and then the door aft corner trim shroud (14). (9) Remove the screws (16) and washers (17) and then the door upper trim shroud (15). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-06 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Main-Door Trim Shroud Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 E B A ZONE 231 C D DET. A 15. UPPER TRIM SHROUD 17. WASHER (5) 16. SCREW (5) 1. VERTICAL TRIM SHROUD DET. E 9. FORWARD CORNER TRIM SHROUD 8. VERTICAL TRIM SHROUD 12. WASHER 2. VERTICAL TRIM 10. WASHER (2) SHROUD 13. SCREW 7. SCREW (6) 3. SCREW (5) 14. AFT CORNER TRIM SHROUD 11. SCREW (2) 4. WASHER (5) 6 . WASHER (6) DET. C 5 . VERTICAL TRIM DET. D 3 SHROUD 1 ALL, EXCEPT FOR A/C WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR AND PRE-MOD SB145-52-0014 DET. B DET. B 2 ONLY FOR A/C WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR, 2 1 OR POST-MOD SB145-52-0014 3 SEALANT RTV 780 EM145AMM250057C.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-06 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MAIN-DOOR TRIM SHROUD ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the main-door trim shroud assembly. (2) The main-door trim shroud assembly is installed in the passenger cabin, around the main door, at zone 231. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION MPP 23-31-03 - MPP 25-21-02 - MPP 33-50-16 - S.B.145-52-0005 - SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) RTV 780 (black) Sealant AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove the old sealant (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Install the door upper trim shroud (15) with the screws (16) and washers (17). (3) Install the door aft corner trim shroud (14) with the screw (13) and washer (12). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-06 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Install the door forward corner trim shroud (9) with the screws (11) and washers (10). (5) Install the door vertical trim shroud (see DET. B) as follows. NOTE: Do step (a) below for all aircraft, except for those equipped with side-hinged main door or POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0005. (a) Install the vertical trim shroud (8) with the screws (7) and washers (6). NOTE: • Do steps (b) and (c) below only for aircraft equipped with side- hinged main door or POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0005. • The vertical trim shroud (2) is attached with Velcro fastener. (b) Install the vertical trim shrouds (1) and (5) with the screws (3) and washers (4). (c) Install the vertical trim shroud (2). (6) Install the screw that attaches the door vertical trim shroud. (7) Install the shroud Assy of the LH cockpit passenger cabin partition (MPP 25-21-02). (8) Install the attendant handset of the LH cockpit passenger cabin partition (MPP 23-31-03). (9) Install the flashlight assembly of the LH cockpit passenger cabin partition (MPP 33-50-16). (10) Apply the sealant around the base of the door corners (9) and (14) (SRM 51-20-01). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-06 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
